In this rep, I'm storing my protocols and code for 3D-DNA FISH and oligo-library FISH.

You can find protocols for FISH with immuostaining and/or EdU labelling.
I'll also include code for designing complex oligo libraries for 3D-FISH.

HAPPY FISHing!
